attributes.action: advocate the replacement of the current Speaker by Vince Cable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs are now generally seen as having their noses in the trough with the current Speaker seemingly unwilling to do anything to help rein them in. He should be replaced by an MP that is widely respected by all sides and the public. I believe Vince Cable would fill that role admirably.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June. Members of Parliament will now decide a replacement.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
